attributes.action: actually pay attention to the petitions posted on this Web site and the views of the people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 1.8 million people signed a petition against road and vehicle pricing, but Tony Blair says they just need persuading. Hundreds of thousands marched on London against the war in Iraq but were ignored. I petition that The Prime Minster should actually act upon the expressed views of the British people and not merely put automatic processes in place, such as e-petitions, which give the appearance of listening and caring.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
